languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} поражает цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночным{/g} выстрелом или атакой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, он получает +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против атак этой цели на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the Fighter uses a single-shot attack against a target armed with a melee weapon, the Fighter gains +<u>5+2×(TOU Bonus)%</u> to Armour against attacks made by that target for 1 round.
When the Fighter uses a single-shot attack or a melee attack against a target, the Fighter gains +<u>5+2×(TGH Bonus)%</u> to Armor against attacks made by that target for 1 round.
When the Fighter uses a single-shot attack or a melee attack against a target, the Fighter gains +<u>5+2×(TGH Bonus)%</u> to Armour against attacks made by that target for 1 round.

When the Fighter uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Fighter gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} поражает цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}одиночным{/g} выстрелом или атакой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, он получает +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против атак этой цели на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the Fighter uses a single-shot attack or a melee attack against a target, the Fighter gains +<u>5+2×(TGH Bonus)%</u> to Armour against attacks made by that target for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Когда воин поражает цель одиночным выстрелом или атакой в ближнем бою, он получает +<u>5+2×(бонус ВЫН)%</u> к броне против атак этой цели на 1 раунд.
Когда воин поражает цель одиночным выстрелом или атакой в ближнем бою, он получает +<u>5+2×(бонус ВЫН)%</u> к броне против атак этой цели на 1 раунд.

Когда воин поражает цель {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}одиночным{/g} выстрелом или атакой в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, он получает +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g} против атак этой цели на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}单发射击{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}攻击敌人后，当该名敌人攻击战士时，战士对此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高+{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当战士使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}攻击敌人后，当该名敌人攻击战士时，战士对此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高<u>（5+2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

当战士使用{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发{/g}攻击或{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}攻击敌人后，当该名敌人攻击战士时，战士对此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}%，效果持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} realice un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} o un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra un objetivo, gana un +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra los ataques efectuados por ese objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el guerrero realice un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}un solo disparo{/g} o un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra un objetivo, gana un +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra los ataques efectuados por ese objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

Cuando el guerrero realice un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}un solo disparo{/g} o un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra un objetivo, gana un +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} contra los ataques efectuados por ese objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen ein Ziel einsetzt, erhält der Krieger für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Angriffe dieses Ziels.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Krieger einen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}Einzelschuss{/g}-Angriff oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen ein Ziel einsetzt, erhält der Krieger für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Angriffe dieses Ziels.

Wenn der Kämpfer einen {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschuss-{/g}Angriff oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} gegen ein Ziel einsetzt, erhält der Kämpfer für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} gegen Angriffe dieses Ziels.

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} lance une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}au coup par coup{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} contre une cible, il bénéficie de +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} pour se défendre des attaques de cette cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Combattant lance une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} contre une cible, il bénéficie de +<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}RES{/g})</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} pour se défendre des attaques de cette cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

Lorsque le Combattant lance une attaque {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}au coup par coup{/g} ou une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} contre une cible, il bénéficie de +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} pour se défendre des attaques de cette cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}がターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}単発射撃{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行った時、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、そのターゲットからの攻撃に対して{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}%される。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ファイターがターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行った時、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、そのターゲットからの攻撃に対して{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+<u>(5 + 2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}TGH{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>%される。

ファイターがターゲットに対して{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を行った時、1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、そのターゲットからの攻撃に対して{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}が+{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}%される。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, bir hedefe {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}tek atış{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş{/g} saldırısı yaptığında bu saldırıların hedefi olan düşmana karşı +%{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} kazanır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} uses a {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacksGlossary}single-shot{/g} attack or a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attack{/g} against a target, the Warrior gains +{uip|BonusArmour|4b091ea00d5e4174baa6db32c1bf19eb}% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} against attacks made by that target for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
